revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ISONWIFI |model=e+ |revision=1 |series=AC1200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=04/26/2018 |fcc_id=2AO3G-E2 |pcb_id=BH25G2813-DC_A3 |type=wireless system |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16EG-AC |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|Smart-Home WiFi System}}
"BH25G2813-DC_A3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
FCC photos show "E05S" on the label which may have been reused from the visibly :similar [[ISONWIFI ISonlink E05S]] which has very different internals.
The User Manual says that each device supports three modes: * Intelligent AP (Access point) * Smart Bridge (Range Extender?) * Station (Wireless Bridge?)
Likely sold as... * e+2: 1x router with 1 WAN/1 LAN and 1x satellite with 2 LAN * e+3: 1x router with 1 WAN/1 LAN and 2x satellite with 2 LAN * e+4: 1x router with 1 WAN/1 LAN and 3x satellite with 2 LAN * e+5: 1x router with 1 WAN/1 LAN and 4x satellite with 2 LAN * e+6: 1x router with 1 WAN/1 LAN and 5x satellite with 2 LAN * e+7: 1x router with 1 WAN/1 LAN and 6x satellite with 2 LAN * e+8: 1x router with 1 WAN/1 LAN and 7x satellite with 2 LAN * e+9: 1x router with 1 WAN/1 LAN and 8x satellite with 2 LAN
__NOTOC__
